bug.author: reyoung
bug.summary: Parallel.Do will produce NaN after several batches.
bug.description: The sample code is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/reyoung/ChineseWordVectors/blob/master/cbow_fluid.py>here</denchmark-link> . When setting with_parallel_do=True and sparse_update=False. The cost could be NaN after several batches.
